EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for your inquiry and interest in Honeywellâ€™s JetWave high-speed global inflight broadband solution. We are reviewing your questions and transferring them to the appropriate sales person in your area.
